name: Stable.com USD3
description: Stable.com USD3 is a payment-first US Dollar stablecoin here to disrupt the current stablecoin landscape. Fully backed 1:1, USD3 is fast, accessible, secure, and provides developers and businesses with a reliable, low-cost means of transacting, as well as access to a range of payment tooling for enhanced utility. Our unique crypto-fintech stack streamlines payments, USD access, trading & settlements, and more for businesses and developers around the world to empower the creation of new and exciting financial use cases. Stable.com USD3 is live on multiple chains, enabling broader accessibility for users.
